Read a NHANES-style CSV file

Source: R/read_nhanes_csv.R
read_nhanes_csv.Rd

Convenience wrapper around readr::read_csv() for NHANES data. This function:

  • checks that the file exists

  • reads the CSV using readr

  • cleans column names (snake_case, lowercase) using janitor

It does not do any recoding or NHANES-specific logic yet. That will be layered on top in later functions.

Usage

read_nhanes_csv(path, ...)

Arguments

path

Path to a NHANES CSV file.

...

Additional arguments passed to readr::read_csv().

Value

A tibble with cleaned column names.
